mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_ATTENDENCE_TB_NO, EVENT_TB_NO, CUSTOMER_TB_NO, ATTEND_DATE FROM EVENT_ATTENDENCE WHERE EVENT_TB_NO=#{eventTbNo} AND CUSTOMER_TB_NO=#{customerTbNo} AND (ATTEND_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), 'yyyy/MM/dd'))
